name: PitchBlack
description:
You are a Cryptozoologist looking at a lead for a mysterious creature living in a flooded valley. You must record evidence of the monster's existence and leave the area before it catches you.

Tutorial:

WASD Keys to Move

Space Bar to Record

Use Mouse Wheel (While Recording) to Zoom In/Out

Press P to Pause the Game

...

Assets I used in-game:

Low Poly Style Asia Environment (Epic Games)

Niagara Footstep VFX (Epic Games)

Zombie Movement and Modular Interaction Animations (Epic Games)

Soul City (Epic Games)

Rusty Stop Sign (Sketchfab)

Player Footsteps  (On Water) (Freesound).

Monster Sounds (Youtube)
